tool_description: The Image Generator API is a simple API that allows you to create static images with custom parameters such as width, height, background color, and text.
name: Image Generator API
title: Image Generator API

api_list.name: postImageToText
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://image-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-generator-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
